remarks: Define the Godel-set of implication.  Here the arguments ` U ` and ` V ` are also Godel-sets corresponding to smaller formulae.  Note that this is a _class_ expression, not a wff.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)
statement:
df-goim $p |- ->g = ( u e. _V , v e. _V |-> ( u |g -.g v ) ) $.
$d u v $.
